LanguageData.ra2_Bullet_Desolator.label: Radiation wave
LanguageData.ra2_Gun_Desolator.label: Radiation beam weapon
LanguageData.ra2_Gun_Desolator.description: Powerful radiation waves can kill any living creature. The damage to mechanical organisms and tanks is also very high. The drawback is that it can't hurt buildings.
LanguageData.ra2_Gun_Desolator.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.ra2_Gun_Desolator.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ra2_Hat_Desolator.label: Desolator's Helmet
LanguageData.ra2_Parka_Desolator.label: Desolator's Suit (top)
LanguageData.ra2_Pants_Desolator.label: Desolator's Suit (below)
